channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HTTPCORE-428] Unhandled CancelledKeyException leads to a shutdown of the underlying IOReactor for SSL session
item.description:

item.summary: Unhandled CancelledKeyException leads to a shutdown of the underlying IOReactor for SSL session

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Fixed in SVN trunk and 4.4.x branch. Please review / re-test and close.

Oleg
